creator: bernard.bardinet@answare.fr
text:
I have got the following checksum errors with the command tar xivf
jakarta-tomcat-3.2.3-src.tar :
x
jakarta-tomcat-3.2.3-src/src/webpages/docs/api/javax/servlet/http/class-use/HttpServletRequest.html,
13790 bytes, 27 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error
x
jakarta-tomcat-3.2.3-src/src/webpages/docs/api/javax/servlet/http/class-use/HttpSession.html,
10221 bytes, 20 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error
x
jakarta-tomcat-3.2.3-src/src/webpages/docs/api/javax/servlet/http/class-use/HttpSessionBindingEvent.100644
, 7039 bytes, 14 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error
x
jakarta-tomcat-3.2.3-src/src/webpages/docs/api/javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/class-use/BodyTag.html,
6161 bytes, 13 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error
x

11180 bytes, 22 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error

, 7039 bytes, 14 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum errorx

6161 bytes, 13 tape blocks
tar: directory checksum error

jakarta-tomcat-3.2.3-src/src/webpages/docs/api/javax/servlet/jsp/tagext/class-use/Tag.html,

You have to use gnu tar, not the one that comes with solaris.
creator: martin@isallineed.org
